drink_info: pour Amaretto,canadian whisky into the shot glass
fill up the shaker with ice
pour hazelnut liqueur,Crème de Cacao,coffee liqueur into the shaker
pour hot water,grenadine,lemon juice,Bourbon into the irish coffee glass
fill up the glass with hot water
pour whiskey into the irish coffee glass
add brown sugar to the glass
fill up the glass with coffee
use the back of a teaspoon to separate layers when pouring
add irish cream,whiskey,hazelnut liqueur to the irish coffee glass
pour hot chocolate,coconut liqueur,white rum,peach schnapps into the irish coffee glass
fill up the glass with hot chocolate
pour mint liqueur,Crème de Cacao,peppermint schnapps into the irish coffee glass
fill up the glass with hot chocolate
garnish with ground chocolate , whipped cream
fill up the collins glass with ice
pour orange juice,peach schnapps,irish whiskey into the glass
fill up the glass with ginger ale
pour whiskey into the collins glass
add ice cubes to the glass
fill up the glass with ginger ale
fill up the shaker with crushed ice
fill up the shaker with ice
pour sweet vermouth,canadian whisky,angostura,absinthe,Benedictine into the shaker
pour sweet vermouth,canadian whisky,angostura,absinthe,Benedictine into the cocktail glass
fill up the shaker with ice cubes
add lemon juice,maple syrup,egg white,campari to the shaker
fill up the shaker with ice
pour cranberry juice,blackcurrant liqueur,vodka into the shaker
fill up the mixer glass with ice
pour Irish Mist,irish whiskey into the glass
pour chai tea into the cocktail glass
add whiskey,honey,Peychaud's Bitters,Cointreau to the glass
fill up the mixer glass with ice
pour orange juice,brandy,angostura into the glass
